column2: "Na Israelmba no nyinara poon hɔnho kehyiae wɔ Siloh
column3: na wosii ehyiadzibuw no wɔ hɔ: na wɔberɛɛ asaase no adze wɔ hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na ɔkaa Israelmba mu ebusuakuw esuon a wonnyae nnkyɛɛ hɔn egyapadze."
"Na Josua bisaa Israelmba no dɛ
column3: Hom rotwetwe homho araa ma ekodu aber bɛn ana hom akɔ akɛfa asaase a EWURADZE

column2: "Hom ntutu hom mu nyimpa
column3: ebusuakuw nyinara mu baasa baasa: na monsoma hɔn
column4: ma wɔnsoɛr nkekyima asaase no mu
column5: na wɔnkyerɛw no nwoma mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ hɔn egyapadze; na wɔmbra mo hɔ."

column2: "Na wɔnkyɛ mu kyɛpɛn esuon: Juda ntsena ne he do wɔ kwaamu afamu."
"Na hom nkyerɛw asaase no kyɛpɛn esuon
column3: na hom mfa nkyerɛwee no mbrɛ me ha: na montwe ho tonto mma hom wɔ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn enyim ha."

column2: "Na Levifo no dze
column3: wonnyi kyɛpɛn wɔ hom mu; osiandɛ EWURADZE asɔfodzi no nye hɔn egyapadze: na Gad nye Reuben nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no enya hɔn egyapadze wɔ Jordan egya boka afamu a EWURADZE n'akowaa Moses dze maa hɔn no."

column2: "Na mbanyin no soɛree
column3: na wɔkɔree: na Josua hyɛɛ hɔn a wɔrokɔ akɛkyerɛw asaase no dɛ
column4: Hom nkɔ nkekyima asaase no mu
column6: na wɔnsan mbra mo hɔ bio
column7: na montwe ho tonto mma hom wɔ EWURADZE enyim ha wɔ Siloh."

column2: "Na mbanyin no kɔree koduaduaa asaase no mu
column3: na wɔkyerɛɛw no dɛ mbrɛ nkurow no tsetsee kyɛpɛn esuon wɔ nwoma mu
column4: na wɔbaa Josua hɔ wɔ nsera mu wɔ Siloh."

column2: "Na Josua twee ho tonto maa hɔn wɔ Siloh wɔ EWURADZE enyim: na hɔ na Josua kyɛɛ asaase no maa Israelmba no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nkyekyɛmu tsetsee."
"Na Benjaminmba ebusuakuw kyɛfa no baa dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: na hɔn kyɛfa ne he fir edzi wɔ Judamba nye Josefmba ntamu."
"Na hɔn he wɔ kwaamu afamu
column3: na ɔfow kodu nkokodo nkurow no mu wɔ anee afamu; na n'edzifir wɔ Bɛt-aven sar do."

column2: "Na ɔhe no twa mu fi hɔ kɔ Luz
column3: wɔ Luz ne nkyɛnmu a ɔnoara nye Bɛtɛl
column4: pomu afamu; na ɔhe no dze sian kɔ Atarot-addar
column5: wɔ bepɔw a ɔda anaafo Bɛt-horon no pomu afamu."

column2: "Na ɔhe no hima na ɔdze dan kɔ anee afamu pomu afamu
column3: dze fi bepɔw a ɔda Bɛt-horon enyim wɔ pomu afamu: na n'edzifir wɔ Kiriat-baal a ɔnoara nye Kiriat-jearim
column4: Judamba kurow no bi a: anee afamu dze nye yi."

column2: "Na pomu afamu dze fi Kiriat-jearim n'ano noho ara
column3: na ɔhe no fir edzi wɔ anee afamu
column4: na ɔdze fir kɔ Nefitoa nsu no no nsunyiwa ho:"

column2: "na ɔhe no sian kɔ bepɔw a ɔda Hinom babanyin ɔbɔn no a ɔwɔ Refafo ɔbɔn no no kwaamu afamu no n'enyim no n'ano noho ara; na osian kɔ Hinom ɔbɔn mu
column3: wɔ Jebusfo nkyɛnmu pomu afamu

column2: "na ohima kɔ kwaamu afamu
column3: na opue wɔ En-semes
column4: na ofir edzi kɔ Gelilot a ɔwɔ Adummim mfowee ne tsentsendo; na osian kɔ Reuben babanyin Bohan ɔbo no no ho;"

column2: "na otwa mu kesi nkyɛnmu wɔ Araba tsentsendo kwaamu afamu; na osian kodu Araba:"
"na ɔhe no twa mu kɔ Bɛt-hogla nkyɛnmu kwaamu afamu: na ɔhe no n'edzifir wɔ Nkyen Po no no kwaamu afamu ewiei: iyi nye pomu afamu he."
"Na Jordan nye ne he wɔ boka afamu. Iyi nye Benjaminmba egyapadze
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n'ahe tsetsee dze hyia
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."

column2: "Afei Benjaminmba ebusuakuw nkurow dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee no nye Jeriko
column3: Bɛt-hogla

column2: "Bɛt-araba
column3: Zemaraim

column2: "Avim
column3: nye Para; Ofra;"

column2: "Kefar-ammoni
column3: Ofini
column4: nye Geba; nkurow duebien ɔnye no nkuraase:"

column2: "Nkaa no nye Gibeon
column3: Rama

column2: "Mizpe
column3: Kefira

column2: "Rekem
column3: Irpeel

column2: "Zela
column3: Ha-elef
column6: nye Kiriat; nkurow duanan ɔnye no nkuraase. Iyi nye Benjaminmba no egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."
